很遗憾您这没有能用的显卡来支持您训练: Unfortunately, you don't have a graphics card that supports model training.
step2b:正在提取特征: Step 2b: Pulling out features سحب السمات
step3a:正在训练模型: Step 3a: Start Model Training بدأ تدريب النموذج
训练结束, 您可查看控制台训练日志或实验文件夹下的train.log: Training completed. You can check the training logs in the console or in the 'train.log' file in the model folder.(تم الإنتهاء من التدريب)
全流程结束！: All processes are completed! جميع العمليات تمت
本软件以MIT协议开源, 作者不对软件具备任何控制力, 使用软件者、传播软件导出: The script was translated and updated by https://www.youtube.com/@MohamedElmazen.
刷新音色列表和索引路径: Update list of Models تحديث قائمة النماذج
卸载音色省显存: Unload voice to save video card memory إلغاء تحميل الصوت
男转女推荐+12key, 女转男推荐-12key, 如果音域爆炸导致音色失真也可: Recommended [+12 for male to female conversion] and [-12 for female to male conversion] [0 for same male>>male or female>>female] ([صوت رجل إلى صوت إنثى +12] [صوت إنثى إلى صوت رجل -12] [0 لنفس النوع] قم بظبط القيمة حتى تصل إلى أقرب نتيجة)
变调(整数, 半音数量, 升八度12降八度-12): Voice pitch (number, semitones, raise an octave: 12, lower an octave: -12) ([الجواب 12] [القرار -12] طبقة الصوت ما بين الجواب والقرار حيث 12 هي الصوت الضخم والقرار هو الصوت المنخفض أو الناعم):
输入待处理音频文件路径(默认是正确格式示例): Enter the path to the audio file you want to process (the correct format is entered by default):
选择音高提取算法,输入歌声可用pm提速,harvest低音好但巨慢无比,crep: Select a key extraction algorithm ('pm': fast extraction but worse speech quality; 'harvest': better bass but very slow; 'crepe': better quality but heavily uses graphics card):
>=3则使用对harvest音高识别的结果使用中值滤波，数值为滤波半径，使用可以: If greater than 3: apply median filtering to the pulled keys. The value controls the radius of the filter and can reduce overbreathing.
特征检索库文件路径,为空则使用下拉的选择结果: The path to the train index file. Leave blank to use the selected result from the list:
自动检测index路径,下拉式选择(dropdown): Automatically find the path to the index and select it from the list:
后处理重采样至最终采样率，0为不进行重采样: Change the sample rate in the output file to the final one. Set to 0 for nothing to change:
输入源音量包络替换输出音量包络融合比例，越靠近1越使用输出包络: Use the volume of the input file to replace or shuffle with the volume of the output file. The closer the ratio is to 1, the more sound from the output file is used:
保护清辅音和呼吸声，防止电音撕裂等artifact，拉满0.5不开启，调低加大保: Protect voiceless consonants and breath sounds to prevent artifacts such as tearing in electronic music. Set to 0.5 to turn off. Decrease the value to improve security, but indexing accuracy may be degraded:
F0曲线文件, 可选, 一行一个音高, 代替默认F0及升降调: F0 arc file (optional). One tone per line. Replaces normal F0 and key modulation:
输出音频(右下角三个点,点了可以下载): Export audio file (click on the three dots in the lower right corner to download)
批量转换, 输入待转换音频文件夹, 或上传多个音频文件, 在指定文件夹(默认op: Convert in batches. Enter the path to the folder where the files to be converted are located or upload several audio files. The converted files will be saved in the specified folder (default is 'opt').
输入待处理音频文件夹路径(去文件管理器地址栏拷就行了): Enter the path to the audio folder for processing:
也可批量输入音频文件, 二选一, 优先读文件夹: You can also upload audio files in batches. Choose one of the two. Priority is given to reading from the folder.
人声伴奏分离批量处理， 使用UVR5模型。 <br>合格的文件夹路径格式举例：:
Batch processing for splitting vocal accompaniment using the UVR5 model.
Example of valid folder path format: D:\path\to\input\folder
The model is divided into three categories:
1. Keep Vocals: Select this option for audio without harmonies. It retains vocals better than the HP5. It includes two built-in models: HP2 and HP3. The HP3 may skip the instrumental a bit, but retains the vocals a bit better than the HP2.
2. Keep Lead Vocals Only: Select this option for a sound with harmonies. This can weaken the main vocal. It includes one built-in model: HP5.
3. Reverb and Delay Removal Models (by FoxJoy):
  (1) MDX-Net: Best choice for stereo reverb removal, but it cannot remove mono reverb;
 (234) DeEcho: Removes delay effects. Aggressive mode removes more thoroughly than Normal mode. DeReverb additionally removes reverb and can remove mono reverb, but is not very effective for highly reverb high frequency content.
Notes on reverb removal
输入待处理音频文件夹路径: Enter the path to the folder with audio files for processing:
指定输出主人声文件夹: Enter the path to the folder for vocals:
指定输出非主人声文件夹: Enter the path to the folder for the instrumental:
step1: 填写实验配置. 实验数据放在logs下, 每个实验一个文件夹, 需: Step 1: Fill in the model settings. The model data is saved in the 'logs' folder and a separate folder is created for each model. Manually enter the path to the settings for the model where the logs and training files are located.
输入实验名: Enter model name: أدخل إسم النموذج
目标采样率: Model sample rate: معدل العينة للنموذج
模型是否带音高指导(唱歌一定要, 语音可以不要): Model key guidance مفاتيح توجهية للنموذج
提取音高和处理数据使用的CPU进程数: Number of CPU processes used to extract keys and process data عدد وحدات المعالج
step2a: 自动遍历训练文件夹下所有可解码成音频的文件并进行切片归一化, 在: Step 2a: Automatically go through all the audio files in the workout folder and normalize the chunks. Will create 2 wav folders in the model folder. Only one voice training is supported at this time.
输入训练文件夹路径: Enter the path to the training folder: مسار مجلد التدريب
step2b: 使用CPU提取音高(如果模型带音高), 使用GPU提取特征(选择: Step 2b: Pull out the keys with the help of the processor (if the model has keys), pull out the features with the help of the video card (choose which one):
以-分隔输入使用的卡号, 例如 0-1-2 使用卡0和卡1和卡2: Enter which video card(s) you want to use separated by '-', for example 0-1-2 to use video card 0, 1 and 2:
选择音高提取算法:输入歌声可用pm提速,高质量语音但CPU差可用dio提速,ha: Select a key extraction algorithm ('pm': fast extraction but worse speech quality; 'harvest': better bass but very slow; 'crepe': better quality but heavily uses graphics card):
step3: 填写训练设置, 开始训练模型和索引: Step 3: Fill in the rest of the training settings and start training the model and index
保存频率save_every_epoch: Save frequency (save every epoch): معدل الحفظ
总训练轮数total_epoch: Total number of epochs (total_epoch): إجمالي عدد حقب التدريب
每张显卡的batch_size: Pack size for video card: حجم الحزمة لبطاقة الرسوم
是否仅保存最新的ckpt文件以节省硬盘空间: Keep only the latest '.ckpt' file to save disk space?: حفظ أخر ملف فقط لتوفير مساحة؟
是否缓存所有训练集至显存. 10min以下小数据可缓存以加速训练, 大数据缓存会: Cache all training sets to video memory. Caching small datasets (less than 10 minutes) can speed up training, but caching large datasets, on the contrary, will take up a lot of video memory and will not speed up training much: إختار لا فهذه الميزة تقوم بتحميل البيانات على وحدة الرسوم وهي لا توفر في الوقت وتستهلك من وحدة الرسوم كثيرا
是否在每次保存时间点将最终小模型保存至weights文件夹: Save a small final model to the 'weights' folder on each savepoint:
加载预训练底模G路径: The Path to the Trained Base Model G:
加载预训练底模D路径: The path to the trained base model D:
一键训练: One Touch Train التدريب بضغطة واحدة
模型融合, 可用于测试音色融合: Model fusion, can be used to test timbre fusion
模型是否带音高指导: Does the model have pitch guidance (1: yes, 0: no):
保存的模型名不带后缀: Name of the saved model (without extension):
修改模型信息(仅支持weights文件夹下提取的小模型文件): Modify model information (only supported for small models taken from the 'weights' folder)
要改的模型信息: Information about the model to be modified:
保存的文件名, 默认空为和源文件同名: The name of the saved file (the default is the same as the input file):
查看模型信息(仅支持weights文件夹下提取的小模型文件): View model information (only supported for small models taken from the 'weights' folder)
模型提取(输入logs文件夹下大文件模型路径),适用于训一半不想训了模型没有自动: Pulling the model (enter the path to the large model file in the 'logs' folder). Useful if you need to complete a train and manually retrieve and save a small model file, or if you need to check an unfinished model:
模型是否带音高指导,1是0否: Does the model have pitch guidance (1: yes, 0: no):
招募音高曲线前端编辑器: Using frontend editors for tonal arcs
加开发群联系我xxxxx: Join the development team and contact me at Mazen VR
点击查看交流、问题反馈群号: Click to view comm group number and issue feedback
音频设备(请使用同种类驱动): Audio device (please use same=same driver type)
hubert模型路径不可包含中文: The hubert model path cannot contain Arabic
pth文件路径不可包含中文: pth file path cannot contain Arabic
index文件路径不可包含中文: The index file path cannot contain Arabic
